scripts.deploy: mkdirp static/libs/bootstrap/css static/libs/bootstrap/js static/libs/fontawesome/css static/libs/fontawesome/webfonts && cpx "node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css" "static/libs/bootstrap/css" && cpx "node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js" "static/libs/bootstrap/js" && cpx "node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/css/all.min.css" "static/libs/fontawesome/css" && cpx "node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/webfonts/*" "static/libs/fontawesome/webfonts"
